stars.name: Stephenson 2-18
stars.description: Stephenson 2-18 is a red supergiant (RSG) or possible extreme red hypergiant (RHG) star in the constellation of Scutum.

stars.name: UY Scuti
stars.description: UY Scuti is an extreme red hypergiant or red supergiant star in the constellation Scutum.

stars.name: RSGC1-F01
stars.description: RSGC1-F01 is a red supergiant located in the RSGC1 open cluster in the constellation of Scutum.
